integer_id.description: Base Type. Query/persist as integer, render as string.

uuid.description: Base Type. Like a normal string, but by default only eq/!eq and case-sensitive.

string_enum.description: String enum type. Like a normal string, but only eq/!eq and case-sensitive. Limited to only the allowed values.

integer_enum.description: Integer enum type. Like a normal integer, but only eq/!eq filters. Limited to only the allowed values.
